text: (napiyē!) Maraṇattiṟkup payantu taṅkaḷ vīṭukaḷai viṭṭu āyirakkaṇakkil veḷiyēṟiyavarkaḷai nīr kavaṉittīrā? Allāh avarkaḷai iṟakkumpaṭik kūṟi (iṟakkac ceytu) piṉṉar avarkaḷai uyirppittāṉ. Niccayamāka allāh maṉitarkaḷmītu karuṇaiyuḷḷavaṉ āvāṉ. Eṉiṉum, maṉitarkaḷil perumpālāṉavarkaḷ naṉṟi celuttuvatu illai
